perturbation.original_text:
V. COMPENSATION

  A. In consideration for the services to be provided, AVDU agrees that it will remit the agreed upon stock certificate within five (5) days of both parties executing this Agreement.

  B. AVDU agrees that UTK shall be entitled to compensation as follows:

SEE STRATEGIC ALLIANCE CONFIDENTIAL TERM SHEET (EXHIBIT A) ATTACHED AND MADE A PART HEREOF.
perturbation.changed_text:
V. COMPENSATION

  A. In consideration for the services to be provided, AVDU agrees that it will remit the agreed upon stock certificate within ten (10) days of both parties executing this Agreement.

  B. AVDU agrees that UTK shall be entitled to compensation as follows:

SEE STRATEGIC ALLIANCE CONFIDENTIAL TERM SHEET (EXHIBIT A) ATTACHED AND MADE A PART HEREOF.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by modifying the payment deadline in Section V.A to ten days, while Exhibit A later specifies a five-day deadline, creating ambiguity regarding the actual payment term. There is a contradiction between Section V paragraph A and Exhibit A, which creates uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: The term of the Agreement will be for 12 months unless terminated sooner. This agreement may be renewed upon mutual, written agreement of the parties. Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: The term of the Agreement will be for 6 months unless terminated sooner. This agreement may be renewed upon mutual, written agreement of the parties. Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text in Exhibit A states the agreement's term is 12 months. By changing it to 6 months, it creates an in-text contradiction. This contradicts the first sentence of paragraph VI which states, "The term of the Agreement will be for 12 months unless terminated sooner".

perturbation.original_text: viii. AVDU will not seek to acquire any technologies presented to AVDU by UTK directly from the technology developer for a period of 24 months following the termination of this Strategic Alliance agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: viii. AVDU will not seek to acquire any technologies presented to AVDU by UTK directly from the technology developer for a period of 12 months following the termination of this Strategic Alliance agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text in Exhibit A states that AVDU will not acquire technology presented by UTK for a period of 24 months. By changing it to 12 months, it creates an in-text contradiction.
